content:
I've used my insect net to catch other things before,
but using it to catch Paper Planes was quite unexpected.
Still, your aim was spot on.

content:
I just observed your creative process,
You're surprisingly skilled,
How should I put it... (thinking)

content:
I've noticed you coming in and out of the Omni-Gallery quite often. I understand.
After all, it's one of the few places here
that has rules about staying quiet.

content: It's just that you seem rather busy.

content:

content:
You are indeed generous.{短暂停}

content:
You can handle them skillfully,
keeping all the creatures you catch alive.

content:
Oh, I'm not very good at taking photos.
Back when I was at the shop,

content:

content:

content: Like a finely-tuned machine.
